PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2021-05212021-06-10FIN,  ,  ,  , 
ActTrust and Loan Companies Act
Bank Act
SubjectRegulations Amending Certain Regulations Concerning Disclosure on Account Opening by Telephone Request
PrecisRegulations amending CERTAIN REGULATIONS CONCERNING DISCLOSURE ON ACCOUNT OPENING BY TELEPHONE REQUEST in order to require federally regulated financial institutions to notify customers that are opening accounts by telephone that deposits in foreign currencies will not be insured by the Canada Deposit Insurance Corporation.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2021-0126 Publication Date: 2021-06-23
AttachmentsAttachment
